metadata.title: Wednesday, 16th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Environment and Natural Resources
parts: (a)    whether the Government has formulated any land policy; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to ensure that customary land under the chiefs is not indiscriminately allocated to private developers thereby depriving the locals of communal land.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when construction of a new secondary school in Kaoma Central Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    when the Government will provide text books to all primary schools in the Constituency; and
(c)    when more lecturers will be sent to Kaoma Trades Training Institute.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when qualified personnel will be sent to the following health facilities in Mwinilunga District:
(i)    Kanyama Rural Health Centre; (ii)    Kakoma Rural Health Centre; (iii)    Chiwoma Rural Health Centre; (iv)    Chibwika Rural Health Centre; and
(v)    Kanzenzi Health Post; and
(b)    when the facilities at (ii), (iii) and (iv) will be rehabilitated.
(a)    when Phase I of the Milenge District Hospital will be opened to the public; and
(b)    when an ambulance will be provided to the Hospital.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to reduce traffic congestion on the Solwezi-Chingola Road; and
(b)    when the Road will be expanded to a dual carriage way.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education what necessitated the change in the academic calendar of the University of Zambia from the semester system to the term system.

parts: (a)    when the Government will commence constructing Milenge District Police Station; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in constructing the Police Station.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the tarring of the Kasempa – Kaoma road will commence;
(b)    what the cost of the project is; and
(c)    what the duration of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when funds allocated for infrastructure development for 2012/2013 will be disbursed; and
(b)    whether the Ministry will meet its goals for infrastructure development for the period at (a).

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Environment and Natural Resources
parts: (a)    whether any family has been displaced as a result of the creation of the Lusaka South Multi-Facility Economic Zone;
(b)    if so, how many families have been affected;
(c)    whether the Government will compensate the affected families; and
(d)    if so, what form of compensation will be provided. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate.
